website_summaries.verdict: Fitbit's Aria Air scale is less than half the price of the Aria 2, but lacks the body fat percentage measurement of the pricier Fitbit scale. If you want a basic scale to sync wirelessly with your Fitbit app, the Aria Air does what you require.
cons: Only really tells you your weight

customer_reviews.title: Great scales!
customer_reviews.text: Had aria scales before and dropped them so needed to buy new. These scales are even easier to use! Rather than having to set up loads of users and it recognising each person, it Bluetooths to the person who has the app open. Really easy to use and to set up. Extremely happy and would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Chloe_dray95

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This makes tracking my weight during dieting so much easier. I love that it syncs directly to my Fitbit app so I don't have to think about logging my weight manually. It also allows me to look at how my weight has fluctuated throughout the month, which is great if you're spurred on by visual aids like me. It also tracks BMI which is useful. My only negative is that for the price, I would have liked the scales to include a few more measurements (e.g. water %). I have another scale from Argos which tells me a lot more than this one.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Absolute waste of money! Set took ages, trying to get it to connect was a nightmare. Finally got it working and then on day 2 it simply would not sync. Tried the help pages but it seems to be a known issue that Fitbit simply cannot be bothered to fix! Instead they would rather you buy their newer scales at an extra £70 !! I don't think so! On their way back for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: paul speed

customer_reviews.title: Dodgy software
customer_reviews.text: OK product but the software behind it is totally flawed. You'd think fitbit don't actually test the products before putting them on sale!
customer_reviews.author: Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Works fine, uploads data to fitbit app only when you open it
customer_reviews.text: The only downside is that fitbit holds your weight data hostage. I had to buy a third party app to sync the data from fitbit to the other apps I use (apple health and myfitnesspal). Having bought this thing I weigh myself a lot more than I used to and, together with daily exercise, have lost a bit of excess weight.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great value.
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to set up, took less than 3 minutes from start to finish. Great product for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Mr C

customer_reviews.title: Poor Technology.
customer_reviews.text: Very poor. Don’t bother buying one of these. I spent an hour trying to get it into “setup mode” without success. Investigation online shows that this is an ongoing problem that has not been adequately addressed by “Fitbit”. Sent it back for refund.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Julian M. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Fitbit Scales
customer_reviews.text: Superb! - beautifully made and look the part! I went for black ( white also available) So easy to set up, it’s instant ( with the Fitbit app) - open app - stand on them - that’s it!!!!!! Very accurate- only disappointing bit was seeing how overweight I’ve become, but with the scales and Fitbit app working together- made me loose 5.2kg in 23 days! - definitely motivates you! Definitely recommend them - providing you are a Fitbit user.
customer_reviews.author: PHIL M.

customer_reviews.title: Very good, but only basic info!
customer_reviews.text: These are great scales, very accurate and sync to your fitbit app very easy so it updates and tracks your weight, But do bear in mind these only do the weight not body fat or any other fancy things. (can measure in Ib, Kg & Stone)
customer_reviews.author: Still Uploading

customer_reviews.title: No wifi functionality
customer_reviews.text: Ended up returning this to get the withings scale. The fitbit aria air does not have wifi functionality so sometimes it doesn't sync with your phone if you don't open the app which just adds an extra step. The withings scale I got automatically syncs to cloud and you can see a graph of your weights on the actual scale.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: didn't do much
customer_reviews.text: for the price, I was expected it to record my BMI, Muscle, fat, water and store a record on this on my phone, all I could get it to record was my weight. I have bought cheaper scales that do everything. The button on the back wasn't work correctly either to change from kg to lb.
customer_reviews.author: cerianne courtney

customer_reviews.title: Syncing doesn't work 99% of the time
customer_reviews.text: The design and feel of the scales is excellent. However after completing setup and syncing with the app, it didn't take long for it to stop working. It worked a couple of times in the beginning, so I know it can do it - but it just decided to stop syncing with the app after a couple of days - and yes I had the app open to the weight section whilst weighing. Save yourself the money and buy a different set of scales - you'll be entering your weight manually either way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sync kept failing.
customer_reviews.text: If I wanted a standard set of scales I would have got a set at half the price of these. The "appeal" of these scales is that they sync to your fitbit and automatically update your weight in the app. Unfortunately that only worked a handful of times for me, 70% of the time it failed. Bluetooth showing as connected just would not sync in the app. After various efforts at troubleshooting I gave up and sent them back. I am using a Samsung Galaxy S10 and have a fitbit sense which syncs just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Howell

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the extra money!
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery packaged appropriately. Accurate weight taking, almost instant syncing to the app and easy to use. The scales look sleek and modern and the app is perfect to track your weight and plot patterns. Overall, a great purchase! Worth the extra money spent compared to an ordinary set of scales. Nothing negative to review!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, easy to use with or without app
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to setup and adjust. Automatically syncs to the Fitbit mobile app when you open it and step on the scales. Accuracy is a bit questionable. Me and other people have noticed that when using it, we are the lights we've been in ages... But need a proper side by side to confirm
customer_reviews.author: Pat Mcd

customer_reviews.title: Stylish scales
customer_reviews.text: Very good scales and connected to the fit bit app very easily, weight can be in stones or kg, A bit pricey for what they are but they do work well within the app if your setting weight goals.
customer_reviews.author: cjs65

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: When I searched on Amazon for body fat scales these came up. They do not measure body fat%. The Fitbit app will workout your BMI . 40 pounds to automatically track your weight and bmi is steep. Disappointed with these and may return them
customer_reviews.author: James Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Is there a lab out there that calibrates home body weight scales?!
customer_reviews.text: Used with FitBit tracker. A vanity issue! Gives me an extra 0.6kg compared with my electronic scales, means more effort for me to get to target weight.
customer_reviews.author: Alan C.

customer_reviews.title: No worth The money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to connect to my fitbit app, I wanted a clear BMI measure and the product description it is misleading. The BMI is calculated as an estimate. There are better scales outthere way cheaper than this. I'm returning this!
customer_reviews.author: Natalia

customer_reviews.title: Good scales
customer_reviews.text: These are good scales. They don’t do body fat or other stats which is a bit unfortunate. I don’t mind the app but the sync isn’t immediate. The main issue is they get very dusty very quickly in our bathroom which isn’t ideal but they are easily cleaned, other then that I am happy with them
customer_reviews.author: S.H.

customer_reviews.title: Cool and sleek
customer_reviews.text: Sleek looking scales and makes it easy to keep track of my weight. Had a few issues getting the app to work but now it works great
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: The most useless device I've ever bought. Took a full day to get it to connect to the app and has only successfully synced once out of hundreds of attempts. Manually entering data now so it's just an expensive normal scale.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew O'Reilly

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and accurate
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant scales synced with my app easily they are simple to use too
customer_reviews.author: simon butler

customer_reviews.title: No issues
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and took seconds to set up. You can use the scales without the app and all you need to do is take the tab off the back. Or you can sync it with the app which takes less than a minute! Really happy so far, and it came with 3x AAA batteries which is a bonus too!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Rigby

customer_reviews.title: Great scales, shame about what they're telling me....
customer_reviews.text: Like the way it connects with your app. Happy with product
customer_reviews.author: Ann McSherry

customer_reviews.title: Good but bluetooth can be slow to start
customer_reviews.text: These are accurate, easy to use, but you need your phone on Wifi to get the scales to find your device, the Bluetooth can also take a while to initiate on the scales.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Very expensive for some scales but nice present that I will use
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up not quite as easy to put on app as have to have Fitbit app open .
customer_reviews.author: linda

customer_reviews.title: digital scale that logs your weight
customer_reviews.text: I love how it logs my weight and it keeps me on track. Great gadget!
customer_reviews.author: M lOPEZ

customer_reviews.title: Save your money!
customer_reviews.text: It's just a set of scales. It doesn't do anything fancy or measure anything that a £5 pair of scales wouldn't do. It doesn't even automatically sinc with your fit bit, you have to manually sinc it with your phone everytime you step on them. save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Great device a great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great device if your using the Fitbit eco system but can be used without
customer_reviews.author: Big Rich

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up from me
customer_reviews.text: Works well within the app but doesn't give out BMI and can't seem to figure out why but it's a great way to track weight and have progress stored in one place
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Expensive scales
customer_reviews.text: It is a great digital scale however that it is. It is only a digital scale..yes it syncs up to your Fitbit app however that’s all it does. Very overpriced for some scales.
customer_reviews.author: miss

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Fitbit scale
customer_reviews.text: It's a great scale which I have it sync to my Fitbit app. It's helping me keep track. About accuracy I guess all scales will differ
customer_reviews.author: steven white

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't sync without closing app. Short lived battery
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't sync with App without force closing it each time. Batteries lasted 2 weeks. After 4 emails to fitbit support gave up and return for refund. Really wanted this to work shame
customer_reviews.author: Mr C Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Use it daily, perfect
customer_reviews.text: Works great, easy to set up, only thing I seem to of missed is how to change the settings for what the units are. Seems to randomly change when it feels like it.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: not worth the money 🤨
customer_reviews.text: Shows different weight everytime you stand on it. Syncs a different weight to charge 3 dashboard. Not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: dorothy

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I need something to motivate myself in weight loss it helps me to check day to day weight good product satisfied

customer_reviews.title: No body fat percentage - have to pay own postage to return!
customer_reviews.text: No body fat percentage (previous models did this) - have to pay own postage to return!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Sent the wrong colour waited agessssss for it to come . But the scales are ace
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: it is good and it looks good.
customer_reviews.text: I ike the way it looks. I am only now seeing the performance.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up fitbit with scales. Would recommend.

Works with the Fitbit app where you can log food, workouts and more
Sync Aria Air with your Fitbit tracker or smartwatch via the Fitbit app where you can see how your activity and habits impact your goals
